text: ōrkku ka: niṅṅaḷ eṇṇattil vaḷare kuṟavāyirunna kālaṁ! bhūmiyil niṅṅaḷann nanne ‎durbakalarāyāṇ karutappeṭṭirunnat. āḷukaḷ niṅṅaḷe ṟāñciyeṭuttēkkumēāyennupēāluṁ ‎niṅṅaḷ bhayappeṭṭirunnu. pinnīṭ allāhu niṅṅaḷkk abhayamēki. tanṟe sahāyattāl niṅṅaḷe ‎prabalarākki. niṅṅaḷkku uttamamāya jīvitavibhavaṅṅaḷ nalki'a. niṅṅaḷ nandiyuḷḷavarākān. ‎
